metadata.Title: CVE-2023-48013 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: GPAC v2.3-DEV-rev566-g50c2ab06f-master was discovered to contain a double free via the gf_filterpacket_del function at /gpac/src/filter_core/filter.c.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
